original_text:
Can that which is tasteless be eaten without salt,
    or is there any taste in the juice of the mallow?
korean_text: 싱거운 것이 소금 없이 먹히겠느냐 닭의 알 흰자위가 맛이 있겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Can that which is tasteless be eaten without salt
sentences.korean_translation: 맛이 없는 것을 소금 없이 먹을 수 있겠습니까?

sentences.original_text: or is there any taste in the juice of the mallow?
